title: Freelance EC Engineer - Ryo
description: Freelance engineer based in Hokkaido, specializing in EC site development using Shopify and WordPress.

hero.title: RyoCode
hero.description: Specializing in EC site development using Shopify and WordPress. Offering comprehensive services from coding to design.

jobs_description.title: Freelance EC Engineer
jobs_description.description: Focusing on EC site development and customization using Shopify. Creating sites that combine modern UI/UX design with high performance. Also providing technical support for sales growth through site renewals, SEO optimization, and performance improvements.

jobs_description.title: Japan Ground Self-Defense Force
jobs_description.description: Served in the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force for 11 years, developing teamwork, leadership, and crisis management skills. These experiences now enhance project management and client communication abilities.

projects.title: Luxury Watch Store EC Site
projects.description: Built an EC site for a luxury watch store using Shopify. Implemented membership system, cross-border EC functionality, and inventory synchronization. Improved conversion rate by 1.5x through site speed optimization.

projects.title: Organic Food Subscription EC Site
projects.description: Developed a subscription-based EC site using WordPress and WooCommerce. Implemented regular delivery system, customer management, and point system. Achieved 150% increase in monthly sales.

projects.title: Apparel Brand EC Site
projects.description: Created an EC site for an apparel brand using Shopify. Implemented size variations, inventory management, and Instagram integration. Optimized mobile shopping experience, doubling mobile purchase rate.

contributions.title: Samurai Engineer Instructor
contributions.description: Working as a Shopify instructor at 'Samurai Engineer' programming school. Supporting students in career changes and providing practical EC development skills training.

contributions.title: Shopify Community Activity
contributions.description: Regularly sharing information and knowledge in the official Shopify community. Particularly focused on sharing insights about customization and performance improvements.

contributions.title: Technical Blog Writing
contributions.description: Running a technical blog about EC development and Shopify customization. Regularly sharing practical development know-how and performance improvement case studies.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Freelance EC Engineer based in Hokkaido
about.description: Started as an independent contractor in 2022, specializing in EC site development using Shopify and WordPress. Capable of handling everything from frontend development to design and site optimization. Particularly experienced in Shopify with over 50 site builds and customizations, covering various business models including subscription services, membership systems, and cross-border EC. Currently also working as an instructor at Samurai Engineer, contributing to the development of next-generation engineers. Committed to solving client challenges through technology and contributing to business growth.

contact.title: Looking forward to discussing your project
contact.subtitle: Feel free to contact me about anything from EC site development to site improvements
